name: com.sapra.infinitelands
description: This package will provide the tools necessary to build an optimized procedural world. It makes use of Jobs and the Burst Compiler to generate the different meshes needed for the generation of the world, making use of a simple Node Editor while also providing an optimized Vegetation Placer that uses GPU instancing to stay light-weight.

samples.description: REQUIRED FOR ALL WORLD GENERATION SAMPLES. Contains the data, materials, prefabs, etc... that are used in each of the World Generation Samples
Requires Shared Content (Global). Sample scenes showing an example of World Generation in Built-in
Requires Shared Content (Global). Sample scenes showing an example of World Generation in URP
Requires Shared Content (Global). Sample scenes showing an example of World Generation in HDRP
Sample scenes showing an example of Grass Displacement in Built-in
